productcode.fieldDescription: This is the produce code to retrieve rates from Interest Rates Manager. Example: "daa" for Everday Options, "eoption" for eOptions.
productcode.name: ./productcode

ratestype.fieldDescription: Rates type, i.e. full table or single rate
ratestype.name: ./ratestype

horizontal_scroll.fieldDescription: The table will not collapse when meeting its minimum width but will become horizontally scrollable instead.
horizontal_scroll.name: ./horizontal_scroll

shadow.fieldDescription: Check this to disable shadow on scroll.
shadow.name: ./shadow

name.fieldDescription: Leave it blank to use the name provided by Interest Rate Manager.
name.name: ./ratename

rowheadingpreview.fieldDescription: This is the row heading to be disaplyed if enabled
rowheadingpreview.name: ./rowHeading

column.fieldDescription: Populates rate short and long description in case their respective columns are not selected.
column.name: ./columnid

ratepreview.fieldDescription: This is the single rate return from IRM.
ratepreview.name: ./ratepreview

shortdiscpreview.fieldDescription: This is the note returned from IRM.
shortdiscpreview.name: ./shortdisclaimerpreview

disclaimer.fieldDescription: This is the long form disclaimer returned from IRM.
disclaimer.name: ./disclaimerpreview

show_ratesymbol.fieldDescription: Select this checkbox to show the IRM Hero rate and symbol returned from the API i.e. show the hero rate as it is returned from the API. For e.g. xx% p.a.^^
show_ratesymbol.name: ./show_ratesymbol

spacing.fieldDescription: Select spacing from the list, the list is authorable
spacing.name: ./spacing

rowHeadingcolor.fieldDescription: Select the Row Heading Text Colour
rowHeadingcolor.name: ./rowTextColor

rowheadingfontsize.fieldDescription: Override the template induced font size for this text by putting required font size in px here.
rowheadingfontsize.name: ./rowFontSize

ratefontsize.fieldDescription: Override the template induced font size for this text by putting required font size in px here.
ratefontsize.name: ./rateFontSize

shortdisclaimercolor.fieldDescription: Select the Short Form Disclaimer Text Colour
shortdisclaimercolor.name: ./shortDisclaimerTextColor

shortdiclaimersize.fieldDescription: Override the template induced font size for this text by putting required font size in px here.
shortdiclaimersize.name: ./sdFontSize

disclaimercolor.fieldDescription: Select the Long Form Disclaimer Text Colour
disclaimercolor.name: ./disclaimerTextColor

longdisclaimertsize.fieldDescription: Override the template induced font size for this text by putting required font size in px here.
longdisclaimertsize.name: ./ldFontSize

disclaimer_alignment.fieldDescription: Long Form Disclaimer Alignment, i.e. Left, center, or right.
disclaimer_alignment.name: ./disclaimeralignment

disclaimer_prefix.fieldDescription: (Optional) This text will appear in the beginning of the disclaimer.
disclaimer_prefix.name: ./disclaimerprefix

disclaimer_suffix.fieldDescription: (Optional) This text will appear in the end of the disclaimer.
disclaimer_suffix.name: ./disclaimersuffix

additionalsymbol.fieldDescription: The symbol will be displayed after the text, e.g. *^
additionalsymbol.name: ./ratesymbol

uppertextsymbol.fieldDescription: The symbol will be displayed after the text, e.g. *^
uppertextsymbol.name: ./uppersymbol

upperextfontsize.fieldDescription: Override the template induced font size for this text by putting required font size in px here.
upperextfontsize.name: ./upperFontSize

text.fieldDescription: (Optional) This text will appear under the rate.
text.name: ./lowertext

lowertextsymbol.fieldDescription: The symbol will be displayed after the text, e.g. *^
lowertextsymbol.name: ./lowersymbol

lowertextfontsize.fieldDescription: Override the template induced font size for this text by putting required font size in px here.
lowertextfontsize.name: ./lowerFontSize

circlewidth.fieldDescription: Override default circle dimension, (in px) this will be applicable for the viewport if its specific data is not provided
circlewidth.name: ./circleWidth

circlepadding.fieldDescription: Add a padding to text in circle to avoid characters going out or coloured circle. (in px) this will be applicable for the viewport if its specific data is not provided
circlepadding.name: ./circlePadding

circlewidth.fieldDescription: Override circle dimension if required, (in px)
circlewidth.name: ./dsCircleWidth

circlepadding.fieldDescription: Add a padding to text in circle to avoid characters going out or coloured circle. (in px)
circlepadding.name: ./dsCirclePadding

circlewidth.fieldDescription: Override circle dimension if required, (in px)
circlewidth.name: ./lvCircleWidth

circlepadding.fieldDescription: Add a padding to text in circle to avoid characters going out or coloured circle. (in px)
circlepadding.name: ./lvCirclePadding

circlewidth.fieldDescription: Override circle dimension if required, (in px)
circlewidth.name: ./mvCircleWidth

circlepadding.fieldDescription: Add a padding to text in circle to avoid characters going out or coloured circle. (in px)
circlepadding.name: ./mvCirclePadding

circlewidth.fieldDescription: Override circle dimension if required, (in px)
circlewidth.name: ./svCircleWidth

circlepadding.fieldDescription: Add a padding to text in circle to avoid characters going out or coloured circle. (in px)
circlepadding.name: ./svCirclePadding
